marcoslar.com

Marcos

I’m Marcos. I live with my wonderful wife (naber canım!)(bak canım, çevrimiçiyim!) in Germany, where I work as a computer programmer software developer. This site is just the place where I try to archive my stuff, so if it’s prose you will find grammar mistakes; if it’s code you’ll definitely find silly bugs. The lar suffix in the marcoslar.com domain name is the plural form of my surname in the Turkish language (so like Marcoses in English, but in English the plural form always sounded to me a bit lame).
